hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Zora Shop#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the Groose is loose.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #the Stone of Agony#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Ice Arrows#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: You're playing a Randomizer. I'm randomized!^${12 48 31}Here's a random number:  #4#.&Enjoy your Randomizer!

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly GS Lobby Basement Upper

hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest
